name: Miss Barbara's Child Care Center Inc
description: Licensed child care center providing quality childcare services for infants through age 12. Celebrating over 20 years of service to families in the London area. Offers a safe and nurturing environment for children with experienced staff.
source: Verified from 411.info business listing and Google search results
notes: Original resource was incorrectly labeled as 'Apprisen' but phone number belongs to this child care center. Apprisen is a credit counseling organization with different phone numbers.
